attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to grant ex gurkha soldiers pre 1997 citizenship and equaulity to the rest of british soldiers.They absolutely deserve nothing less than the right to remain in the country they have fought for and should recieve equal pensions to any other retired soldier,any thing less is a discgrace!Medals do not pay bills,reward them with equal pensions and the right to remain in the country. We allow just about everyone else into the country and look after them ,but not these heroic soldiers who have fought for queen and country!!
WHAT AN ABSOLUTE NATIONAL DISCGRACE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
